ygData.subject: Re: Pie Tins
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I disagree with this.  The Pie Tins have been there everytime I have checked, and I can buy infinite numbers of them.  When a player sells to a vendor the
ygData.messageBody:
No, I disagree with this. The Pie Tins have been there everytime I
have checked, and I can buy infinite numbers of them. When a player
sells to a vendor the vendor can only sell as many as the player gave.
Also, during clean-up, the tins do not get erased with all the rusty
equipment sold.

They *DO* sell pie tins, sir. I have made sure to go back many times
to rehash the theory.

--- Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...> wrote:
> From: Conrad Lesnewski <clesnew@...>
>
> In both cases, the pie tins are there because a
> player potter sold them to
> the NPC while building his skill up. Try buying
> them from him, at some
> point they will dissappear. NO NPC carries Pie Tins
> as part of their
> stock. They only have what players sell to them.
>
>
> Zach Heaven wrote:
>
> > From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
> >
> > *SPOILER*
> >
> > I have found pie tins in two good places. They
> sell
> > for around 9gp each.
> >
> > In GFaydark take the Orc Lift in Kethkin(sp?) up.
> > Across one bridge or up one ramp (can't remember,
> need
> > to go look again) there is an Inn. The vendor in
> the
> > Inn sells pie tins if you scroll down just a bit.
> My
> > wife (Mariposa) found this.
> >
> > In Freeport North, if you turn out of the bank and
> > take an immediate left there is an un-named
> building
> > with two women in it. The woman on the right
> sells
> > pie tins. For about the same price.
> >
> > -Kryogen, Bertoxxulous
> >
